00035 void QEQueue::init(QEvent const *qSto[], QEQueueCtr qLen) {
00036     m_frontEvt = (QEvent *)0;                        // no events in the queue
00037     m_ring     = &qSto[0];
00038     m_end      = qLen;
00039     m_head     = (QEQueueCtr)0;
00040     m_tail     = (QEQueueCtr)0;
00041     m_nFree    = qLen;
00042     m_nMin     = qLen;
00043 
00044     QS_INT_LOCK_KEY_
00045     QS_BEGIN_(QS_QF_EQUEUE_INIT, QS::eqObj_, this)
00046         QS_OBJ_(qSto);                                  // this QEQueue object
00047         QS_EQC_(qLen);                              // the length of the queue
00048     QS_END_()
00049 }
